key_themes: Rate policy and geopolitical hedging uncertainty

Institutional hedging despite bullish retail sentimentâ€”classic divergence leading to volatility

analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Testing active Call Wall resistance at $700; watch $670 active support hold. QQQ: Active resistance at $640 and $625 (both 2.6% and 0.2% away respectively); any break above $630 Call Wall would signal continuation. Support levels dormant until deeper pullback approaches $590.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Bias toward higher levels if $670 support holds and $700 resistance breaks; max pain $686 acts as gravitational anchor for 1-5 day consolidation. Watch for approach to $750 dormant resistance (8.6% away). QQQ: More constrained; $625-$630 represents tight consolidation zone; break above $630 opens path to $640, but put wall at $590 (164k OI) provides strong 5-day downside support if momentum reverses. Crypto: Per sources, Bitcoin and Ethereum at psychological resistance; silver volatility criticalâ€”breakdown would validate bearish exhaustion thesis.
